enWisdom: The best reserve is true guidance
The best of paths is [the path of] right guidance

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ بَادَرَ الْهُدَى قَبْلَ أَنْ تُغْلَقَ أَبْوَابُهُ
enWisdom: Blessed is the one who hastens towards true guidance before its doors are closed

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ رَكِبَ الطَّرِيقَةَ الْغَرَّاءَ وَلَزِمَ الْمَحَجَّةَ [الْحُجَّةَ] الْبَيْضَاءَ وَتَوَلَّهَ بِالْآخِرَةِ وَأَعْرَضَ عَنِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Blessed is the one who embarks on the way of the honorable and sticks to the highway of illumination [and truth]; and [one who] is infatuated with the Hereafter and turns away from this world
Following true guidance leads to salvation

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِمَنْهَجِ الِاسْتِقَامَةِ فَإِنَّهُ يَكْسِبُكَ الْكَرَامَةَ وَيَكْفِيكَ الْمَلَامَةَ
enWisdom: Adopt the way of steadfastness, for indeed it will earn you honour and save you from reproach
Let your garment be true guidance
One who is guided attains salvation
There is no deviation with true guidance
There is no guide better than true guidance
